regen.absent_element: postponed queue processing for turning on requests
regen.new_specification: The system shall automatically attempt to honor queued requests to turn on units whenever the number of active units falls below the maximum allowed.

regen.absent_element: the management of queue when limits change or units turn off
regen.new_specification: The THEMAS system shall monitor the LIFO queue and automatically process queued requests when the number of active heating or cooling units falls below the maximum limit.

regen.absent_element: systematic monitoring and control over heating and cooling units
regen.new_specification: The THEMAS system shall continuously monitor and manage the operation of each heating and cooling unit to ensure compliance with operational thresholds and adjust operations as necessary.

label: When a request to turn off a heating or cooling unit is received, this process shall first check the LIFO queue and remove the unit-turn-on request from the queue if exists.
absence: action of checking the queue and removing the unit-turn-on request if exists when a request to turn off a unit is received
